entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Puvirnituq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:11 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -23.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Puvirnituq Airport 2:54 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -23.4°C
Pressure: 102.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -32
Dewpoint: -26.1°C
Wind: S 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 31.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 31. Wind chill minus 38 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 12:12 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 12:12 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 30.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 52 in the morning and minus 40 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 12:12 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023
